about:
Usage: `.about`
Gives info about the bot
profile:
Usage: `.profile [user (Optional)]`
Gives info about the user
help:
Usage: `.help [command (Optional)]`
Shows all commands, or info about 1 command
serverinfo:
Usage: `.serverinfo`
Gives info about the server
ping:
Usage: `.ping`
Gets the API response time about the bot
purge:
Usage: `.purge [int]`
Manage Messages
Purge up to 100 Messages youngert than 2 weeks
stop:
Usage: `.stop`
Owner Only
Stops the bot from running
Only Use in Emergency
rename:
Usage: `.rename [string]`
Manage Channels
Renames a Channel
slowmode:
Usage: `.slowmode [seconds]`
Manage Channels
Changes the slowmode of a channel
reload:
Usage: `.reload`
Owner Only
Reload all Commands
dingus:
Usage: `.dingus [string]`
Call someone or something a "Dingus"
roll:
Usage: `.roll [sides] [amount (Optional)] [modifier (Optional)]`
Roll a die with as many sides as you want
cookie:
Usage: `.cookie [user]`
Give a cookie to someone...
Hope they aren't allergic to Gluten
